author: Benpowell
title: Great hotel to stay in.
text: We stayed here for a week in March. Everyone was very friendly and helpful. The room was a family room and for new York was a good size. There was a fridge, a safe, TV, ipod dock, hairdryer, iron and loads of freebies in the bathroom. The beds were very comfy and we had no noise issues. We asked for a room with a bath and that's what we got. All clean and tidy all round. The maids were friendly and accommodating. We had to stay an extra night due to a flight cancellation and the hotel helped us to stay an extra night in the same room. A great location just a couple of minutes walk from Times Square and 24 hour shops nearby. Highly recommended.
